title: Paper accepted at EMNLP 2025
description: Our paper 'SilVar' has been accepted for publication at main EMNLP 2025.

title: Started research collaboration with HysonLab - UAB and Knovel
description: Beginning collaboration with Prof. Hy Truong Son (Alabama University) and Dr. Pham Tan Hanh (Harvard University) on Explainable AI & Multimodal Systems Research.

title: Started Master's program at Uppsala University
description: Began pursuing Master's degree in Computer Science at Uppsala University, Sweden, focusing on Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science.

title: Paper accepted at PACLIC 38
description: Our paper, Advancing Vietnamese Information Retrieval with Learning Objective and Benchmark, was accepted for oral presentation at PACLIC 38.

title: Paper accepted at SRW-ACL 2024
description: Our work, ViMedAQA, was accepted at SRW-ACL 2024.

title: Top 5 Finalist at AIC2024
description: Our work, Perceiver, achieved Top 5 finalist position in AIC2024 Track 2: Multi-view-video Description Generation, achieving performance comparable to 14B-32B models with just 1.5B parameters.

title: Paper accepted at NAACL 2024
description: Our paper, ViGLUE, was accepted at findings NAACL 2024.
